name: WAMEX Private Equity
overview: WAMEX Private Equity Management is a private equity firm specializing in middle market investments. The firm prefers to invest in the manufacturing and services industries. It seeks to invest in Mexican and European established businesses, mainly family companies, with annual revenues of around $10 million. The firm takes influential minority or outright majority positions through privately owned equity or convertible debt, and typically invests for a period between three and five years in its portfolio companies. It wishes to invest between $10 million and $15 million per transaction. WAMEX Private Equity Management was founded in 1999 and is based in Mexico, Mexico with additional offices in Stuttgart, Germany and Ottobrunn, Germany.

funds.name: WAMEX Private Equity Fund II
funds.source_description: WAMEX Private Equity Closes Second Growth Equity Fund at $160M
